    Wayne Ye

    I am a software engineer, technical lead and also a geek, I've immersed in software/web development for 14 years, I hack using these languages: Python, Golang, JavaScript/nodejs, Ruby/RoR, C#. I am an AWS Certified Solutions Architect (2017-2019), PMP and CodeProject MVP.
